tool_description: API which returns news and most important info from ESPN articles (with a valid ESPN Url)
name: ESPN article and news scraping
title: ESPN article and news scraping

api_list.name: F1
api_list.description: Get most important new from F1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://espn-article-and-news-scraping.p.rapidapi.com/espn/f1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "espn-article-and-news-scraping.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
